ygData.subject: Re: siphon strength
ygData.msgSnippet: I have NO idea, I assumed it did!! Try this, get together with a buddy ( or tie down a newbee) and practice you spells!!  Use it on them over and over and see
ygData.messageBody:
I have NO idea, I assumed it did!!

Try this, get together with a buddy ( or tie down a newbee) and
practice you spells!! Use it on them over and over and see what the
effect is directly. Of course, they need to be a "valid target", or
you need to play on my beloved Rallos Zek.

The same should go for thieves and rangers. Play "pick my pocket" (in
private I hope...hehe) or "hide and go track". Practice makes the
game what t is, so do it.

~Xillith, Lady of Pain


>From: "Mike" <mikekb@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] siphon strength
>Date: Sun, 18 Apr 1999 16:44:20 -0500
>
>Does anyone know for sure whether siphon strength is cumulative to
the target? Everytime you use it, it says the target weakens. So,
does it help to keep casting it?
>
>- Saron, lvl 10 Human SK on Karana
